settings.title: Return Policy
settings.content: Absolutely no returns on soil, liquids, powders, nutrients, amendments, or potting materials. All equipment returnable up to 14days of purchase if returned in exact condition as purchased with a 15% restocking fee, unless defective. If item is defective a RMA must be done before refund is issued. Lead time may vary.

settings.title: Advanced Nutrients
settings.content:
Advanced Nutrients pH Perfect technology automatically stabilizes and locks in your pH within the optimal range of 5.5 to 6.3.

The plants you grow have special needs. Through rigorous testing, Advanced Nutrients became the first to discover these unique needs. And we’ve designed products that give your crops exactly what they need when they need it.

settings.title: Grow Lighting
settings.content: We will find you the best price possible. Let us lighten your grow project today!

settings.title: Mike Merx
settings.description: Mike has 19 years of horticultural experience culminating in skills across a variety of focuses. Beginning in high school, Mike received a certificate in greenhouse management while working in climate-controlled greenhouses. More recently he served an internship with the Missouri Botanical Garden. Mike has experience in plant production, planting and plant maintenance of a wide variety of plants on a commercial level. He is licensed as a commercial pesticide applicator and integrated pest management. ( IPM )

settings.title: Ryan Davis
settings.description: Ryan is a classic serial entrepreneur of no less than five companies. He began his journey in high school alongside Mike learning greenhouse management while working in climate-controlled greenhouses. With this knowledge in hand and a hot sauce company under his belt, he moved to Washington State where he gained over a decade of medicinal growing experience. His skills include business management, strategy and development, large scale grow facility operations and plant environment expertise.
